sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>
    <el-form :inline="true" label-position="right" label-width="100px">
      <el-row>
        <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.pdCode')">
          <el-input style="width: 300px" v-model="entity.pdCode"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-row>
      <el-row>
        <el-form-item :label="$t('customComponents.pdEdition')">
          <el-input style="width: 300px" v-model="entity.pdEdition"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-row>
      <el-row>
        <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.targetFormName')">
          <el-input style="width: 300px" v-model="entity.tableName"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-row>
      <el-button  size="small" @click="testSQL" type="primary">{{$t('i18nView.SQL')}}</el-button>
    </el-form>
  </cus-wraper>
</template>
<script>

  import {testSQL} from "@/api/basicinfo/testSQL"
  import {downloadReleFile} from "@/api/basicinfo/pdtemppdverrls"

  export default {
    name: 'testSQL',
    data() {
      return {
        entity: {
          pdCode: '',
          pdEdition: '',
          tableName: ''
        }
      }
    },
    created() {
    },
    methods: {
      testSQL() {
        testSQL(this.buildRequestData(this.entity)).then(response => {
          let data = {"filePath": response.data.filePath}
          downloadReleFile(this.buildRequestData(data)).then(res => {
            this.downloadResponseFile(res, response.data.fileName)
          })
        })
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
